scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/types/core dist/types/db dist/types/dto dist/types/sources
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter @jspulse/shared run dev" "pnpm --filter @jspulse/backend run dev" "pnpm --filter @jspulse/frontend run dev"
